Title: MRC UTOPIA LADIES WATCH MOTHER OF PEARL FACE DIAMOND BEZEL MSRP $6,000
Description: Presented here for sale is a very nice MRC - Manufacture Rodolphe Cattin- Utopia Ladies's watch. This watch features: 1 Timezone Display White MOP (Mother of Pearl) Dial75 Diamonds in Bezel totaling 0.50ct Alligator Strap Folding Buckle 40 mm MSRP on this watch is $6,000 Rodolphe Cattin was part the creative team for the Swatch Group (which is also known for major brands like Blancpain, Omega, Breguet, Rado, Longines etc.) and later on Rodolphe Cattin worked with Franck Muller for few years. Fast forward to December 2010, and Rodolphe Cattin launched his own brand, MRC (Manufacture Rodolphe Cattin). Rodolphe Cattin brought all his creativity and long time experience into his brand, MRC, and then imediately introduced a line-up of watches for men and women. For women, there are the Utopia and Adore collections with mother-of-pearl dials and ball-like designed lugs, bringing elegance to the pieces. The Utopia, like the Adore models, has a quartz movement and a polished square shaped case. The Adore timepieces have a sofa-shaped case. This watch is made in Switzerland.This watch is sold and shipped from an authorized retailer.
